title: @Oceania Esports Personnel, why are you so intent on hiding the OCE Competitive Scene?
body:
I mean, come on. It's an English Stream and the player quality *can't* be any worse than the NA and EU Challenger Series - and they actually get broadcast on the main LoL Esports Youtube Channel.

What's the deal guys? Do you **want** our scene to not grow and gain a decent fanbase?

replies.body:
Same reason Brasil, Latin America Server, Russia and Turkey have it hard, they are less developed Regions (does not mean they are not trying to go full pro) and now Japan even is trying to get a server, Honestly I think its best to grow inside own region first and get the level higher, in both player quality and team value, the Asian Servers for Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan/Taipei for example split into two leagues, making it not as interesting yet as the Korean and Chinese Leagues, despite the fact Taipei has a World Champion team...

I do however agree that they could try and boost your region more, for example put you streamed on Riot Games on Monday or Tuesdays. As it is a English Region just like EU and NA.

Keep in mind that Brasil, LA, Russia and Turkey all have non-English speaking casters whereas we actually have English speaking casters.

Riot could at least advertise OPL on the LoL Esports website - even if the stream itself is on the OCE Riot Channel.

You remember DP?

You know that laughing stock team that was in worlds, the one that got utterly raped?

Yeah we are basically like that compared to NA, EUW, etc.

Fact is teamwise, we are decent, just not good (and probably about in line with DP.)
Shouldn't that be even more reason for us to adopt the LCS format? It really couldn't hurt to at least make the OPL known to other regions via the LoL Esports page.

Not really, what it means is more we need to find ways for our top teams to be able to scrim the NA/EUW/Korean/Chinese teams, and get to a level where we are actually competitive.

Put it this way, would you want to see a bunch of plats play where you see the challengers play? (that's a pretty viable comparison across servers for our teams.)

We watched the NA and EU competitive scenes when they weren't any more developed than the OCE competitive scene currently is.

Why should OCE deserve any less?
Because at the time they were still the best?
Fk no OCE is the bset region ever keane and veritas are my heroes
On an individual level maybe, but on a team level, no we aren't.
